section_title: Feasibility of developing guidelines for the review of national communications:
sentences: Delegates agreed to a proposal by SBI Chair Ashe that this issue be considered after the review of third national communications.
Conclusions were adopted and are contained in the report of the SBI (FCCC/SBI/2001/L.2).
The conclusions take note of a workshop report on exchanging information on preparation of third national communications, and note that the SBI will return to this issue at a future session.
enb_long_title: Seventh Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
